name: Prediction Market Signal Aggregator
description: Real-time prediction market data from Polymarket, Metaculus, and PredictIt. Get odds, volume, and market signals for AI trading and forecasting agents.
longDescription: Aggregate prediction market data from Polymarket, Metaculus, PredictIt, and other major platforms. Get real-time odds, trading volume, market signals, and resolution criteria. Query by category or keyword. Returns structured JSON with current probabilities, volume data, market details, and cross-platform comparisons. Essential for trading agents, research, forecasting, and decision-making automation.
whyMobileProxy: Polymarket and PredictIt aggressively rate-limit datacenter IPs. Mobile carrier IPs (4G/5G) provide reliable access to market data APIs without triggering CAPTCHA or IP bans. Critical for high-frequency market monitoring.

trending.markets: Market[] — title, platform, probability, volume, url, category, lastUpdated, traders, description

vs.name: Polymarket API
vs.price: Free but rate-limited, datacenter IPs blocked
vs.limitation: Single platform only, no cross-platform aggregation

vs.name: Manifold API
vs.limitation: Small prediction market, not real money

competitive.ourAdvantage: Multi-platform aggregation (Polymarket + Metaculus + PredictIt) via mobile proxies. $0.01-0.02/query with no subscription. Structured JSON with probabilities, volume, and resolution criteria.

limitations: Some markets may have delayed data (up to 5 minutes)
Kalshi requires paid API key — not included in this free tier
Market details not available for closed/resolved markets
PredictIt has limited public API — uses web scraping

/api/predictions/trending.description: Get trending markets across all platforms sorted by volume

/api/predictions/search.description: Search markets by keyword across all platforms

params.url: string (required) — market URL from trending or search

/api/predictions/details.description: Full market details: order book, resolution criteria, comments
